info.description:
I used the pattern from my [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/view/3djfWV]jungle planet[/url] shader to make this endless forest.
Click and drag the mouse to look around.

There is also a version with camera control: https://www.shadertoy.com/view/tlsyRH
info.name: Infinite Jungle
